recipesJson.name: California Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: CenCalVape
recipesJson.description: Lose yourself in the warm sun of the California coast. Fresh picked and candied strawberries atop a decadent dense cheesecake. The crust is a crumbly, sweet double graham cracker base so tasty that you could die in deliciousness. If you think you've tried cheesecake, you haven't even scratched the surface.

reviews.text: This is great! Got a nice 3 week steep on it and it’s lovely. Great graham finish to it, and the first that actually has that cheesecake sourness to it that I’ve tried. Well done!
Solid and delicious. Worth investing in the lb concentrate.
I'm really enjoying this recipe! I picked up LB Strawberry Cheesecake just for this recipe!
